story.book

Class LocalStoryController

  • java.lang.Object
    • story.book.LocalStoryController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StoryController

    public class LocalStoryController
extends java.lang.Object
implements StoryController
    Story controller for the LocalStoriesActivity to manage locally stored stories. This controller interfaces with the IO to save, and create Story objects.
    Author:
    Alexander Cheung

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LocalStoryController() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createStory()
      Instantiates a new Story object and sets the current application Story to the new object.
      void deleteStory(int SID)
      Deletes the locally stored Story with the specified SID.
      void getStory(int SID)
      Sets the current application Story to the locally stored Story with matching SID.
      java.util.ArrayList<StoryInfo> getStoryList()
      Returns the list of StoryInfo corresponding to all locally stored stories.
      void saveStory()
      Save the current application Story to local storage.
